method.text: Rinse the split peas well. Place peas into a large pan with the water. Bring to boil for 10 min, cover and simmer for a further 30 min.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a pan and saute onion and garlic for 1-2 min without colouring. Add potato, chilli and ginger. Stir and cook for 10 min until evenly browned. Add the curry powder and cook for 5 min.

Carefully add the onion mixture to the split peas. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 30 min or until the sweet potatoes are cooked. Leave to cool a little. Then blend in a food processor or until the desired consistency is reached
Return to the pan to re-heat. Season to taste.
